title: Rent-to-Own in Canton Twp. 4 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: ['BEAUTIFUL 4 BR COLONIAL IN BRIDGEMONT PARK.', 'OPEN FLOOR PLAN.', 'CERAMIC FOYER.', 'DOUBLE STAIRCASE.', 'GR W/NATURAL FIREPLACE, MARBLE SURROUND, CROWN MOLDING.', 'GOURMET KIT W/ISLAND.', 'MB HAS SEPARATE SOAKING TUB, WALK-IN CLOSET.', 'DOUBLE SINKS.', 'FINISHED BASEMENT INCLUDES MOVIE THEATER, BAR, OFFICE, BATHROOM.', 'PATIO DOOR OPENS TO THE DECK W/STEPS DOWN TO THE BACKYARD.', 'PROFESSIONAL LANDSCAPE/SPRINKLE SYSTEM.', 'CONVENIENT LOCATION.', 'MIN.', '2 YEARS.', 'NON-REF.', 'PREPARATION FEE.', 'APPL.', 'FORM, CREDIT REPORT W/SCORES.', 'PROOF OF INCOME REQ.', 'NO PETS PLEASE.', '***Please Text LORI', 'to', 'show contact info', 'For  Details & Pictures***', 'Brought to you by Lori Anderson at RE/MAX Classic - Farmington Hills']
